title: Railworks TS2015 Virtual Railroads DR BR243 EL YB70
description:
DR BR243 cities Xpress The vehicle package contains the series 243 of the German Reichsbahn from the former GDR, including the car Ame, Bme and WRGE in the colors of the cities Express cars. The cars are equipped with a simple passenger view and have Zuglaufschilder that in connection with the present Lok keystroke can be switched.

The contained mobile models in the series 243 are characterized by 
extensive functions of and are not for beginners suitable in TS

to have thrown !!
